description: More Shopping,More Funny Monkeysell has always working hard to seek out various funny products to make the customers gain more happiness. Features: Stop digging through drawers or makeup bags for your Cosmetics! Keep them organized in this attractive holder. Solid construction and sturdy base. Will hold most sizes and shapes of tube lipsticks and lip moisturizers. It could be in personal bathroom, a vanity area or your salon, our organizers are made to visually stimulate and highlight your beauty products. Displays elegantly on any bathroom or bedroom vanity. Keeps lipsticks neat and organized on bathroom closet shelves. Even fits inside most drawers! Saving you space. Awesome! Really, really awesome! Specifications: Color: Clear Material: Acrylic Package includes: - Cosmetics holder
